title: Father arrested after 12-year-old shoots himself
content:
Autoplay:Father arrested after 12-year-old shoots himselfCONNECTING...
LAS VEGAS, NV (KTNV) -
On February 13, around 6:56 p.m., patrol officers were called to a residence near Buffalo and Vegas Drives for a report of a child shot.
Arriving officers located a 12-year-old male juvenile with an apparent gunshot wound. The child was transported by medical personnel to UMC where he was later pronounced deceased.
The investigation initiated by the LVMPD Abuse and Neglect Detail indicated the injury appeared to be self-inflicted. Further investigation revealed the firearm recovered at the scene was purchased previously by the father, identified as 31-year-old Olin Manuel.
Manuel was arrested without incident on February 17, 2016 and transported to the Clark County Detention Center where he faces the following charges:
The identity of the victim, as well as the cause and manner of death will be released by the Clark County Coroner’s Office.
Anyone with information is urged to call Crime Stoppers by phone at 702-385-5555.
